import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'core/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.scss'] }) export class SearchComponent { query: string = ''; searchRes: any[] = []; constructor(private dataService: DataService) { } searchRepos() { this.dataService.get('search', this.query).subscribe((e: any) => { this.searchRepos = e; }, (e) => console.log(e)); } bookMark(repo: any) { this.dataService.post('bookmark', repo).subscribe((e: any) => { }, e => console.log(e)); } }
